projects.title: Projects

project.chess.title: ChessNut

home.presentation.title: Presentation
home.presentation.ens: License 3 and Master 1 in the computer science curriculum at ENS Rennes. The courses taken during this curriculum are presented in this syllabus.
home.presentation.prepa: Three years in preparatory class at the high school Champollion, including two years in MP* and in the X-ENS preparation group.
home.presentation.lycee: After studying at the middle-high school La Favorite, I obtained the scientific Baccalauréat with honors.
home.presentation.stage.title: Research team work
home.presentation.stage.desc: During the summer of 2023, I completed a two-month internship within the Elan team at Inria Grenoble. I had the opportunity to work daily with PhD students.
home.presentation.concours.title: Competitions
home.presentation.concours.desc: I participated in the general competitions of mathematics, physics and SVT in 2019. In 2018, I was ranked 25th regionally in the mathematics olympiad. In 2019, I obtained second place in a public speaking competition organized by my high school.
home.presentation.cours.title: External courses
home.presentation.cours.desc: Between 2018 and 2019, I attended mathematics courses given by the ENS Lyon on Sundays from 8am to 2pm. I also volunteered to tutor middle school students.
home.presentation.autres.desc: During middle school, I obtained the aeronautical initiation certificate (2016) and attended various scientific conferences. I also completed a one-month internship at the company Climb Up.
home.presentation.cultures.title: Cultural interests
home.presentation.cultures.theatre.title: Theatre
home.presentation.cultures.theatre.desc: I grew up in the world of theatre — ~10 years of experience before preparatory class. At ENS Rennes, I acted and sang in the musical and in the choir; I was in charge of the musical and president of the choir. No matter what anyone says, my favorite author is Samuel Beckett.
home.presentation.cultures.sport.title: Sport
home.presentation.cultures.sport.desc: Practicing high-altitude activities: climbing, mountaineering, skiing, etc.
home.presentation.cultures.jeux.title: Favorite indie games
home.presentation.cultures.jeux.desc: Outer Wilds, Undertale, Tunic, Fez, The Moonstone Equation.
syllabus.title: My syllabus
syllabus.agreg.desc:
The syllabus is the 2025 French academic programme:

  • High School (Terminale)
  • MPI
  • Licence
syllabus.M1.sem1.desc:
• Advanced operating systems with Isabelle Puaut
  • Complexity theory with François Schwarzentruber
  • Software formal analysis and design with Thomas Genet
  • Digital sobriety with Olivier Ridoux
  • Signal processing with Nicolas Keriven
syllabus.M1.sem2.desc:
• Information theory and coding with Eric Fabre
  • General compiler concepts with Simon Rokicki
  • Machine learning with Ewa Kijak
  • Computer graphics with Marc Christie
  • Epistemology with Filipe Drapeau-Contim
syllabus.L3.sem1.desc:
• Algorithmics 1 with François Schwarzentruber
  • System architecture 1 with Steven Derrien
  • Network and C programming with Simon Rokicki
  • Language theory and computability with Gilles Lesventes
  • Programming 1 in OCAML with David Baelde
  • Complementary mathematics: optimization with Baptiste Huguet.
  • Lebesgue integral
syllabus.L3.sem2.desc:
• Algorithmics 2 with François Schwarzentruber
  • Probability and statistics with François Schwarzentruber
  • Complementary mathematics: algebra.
  • System architecture 2 with Simon Rokicki
  • Cryptography with Adeline Roux-Langlois
  • Image processing with Emmanuel Caruyer
  • Logic with David Baelde
  • Object programming with C with Martin Quinson
